title: (x) Heavy serif "Inspire" logo - Caslon {Yves}
content:
Hello, I need to ID this typeface. Any ideas will be helpful.

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Inspire-font.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20060503065736/http:/typophile.com/files/Inspire-font.png) | 11.82 KB |
author: Bouch

comments.content: This is a heavy weight of some [Caslon](http://web.archive.org/web/20060503065736/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&startrow=1&records=20&currpage=1&totalrecords=37&searchby=&searchID=&searchletter=&searchstr=caslon&font_categories_checkbox=font_name_search&fontRendererText=INSPIRE) with a customised _R_.
That R is not very inspiRing.

Nor, might I add, are the IN or IR collisions. Sometimes the urge to kern is life-threatening.

^\_^

—Jim K.

Yes, it’s very un-inspiring to be sure!

Caslon it is, or close enough anyway.

Thanks.
